website_summaries.verdict: Provides an ability to upgrade a POL LP propane tank to the more common QCC1 connection.
pros: Accurate propane tank gauge is easy to install on a POL tank to convert it to QCC1
Color-coded gauge is easy to read, helping you figure out the tank's current fill level
cons: A little pricier than some similar models
Will not fit all propane tanks

customer_reviews.title: reverse threading
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance because I couldn't find an accurate description, but it does have reverse threads and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M

customer_reviews.title: The guage for a lifetime?
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned about this valve as most all the other guage valves I've ever used stop working after a few months. I've had this one for quite a while now and it not only still works, but, is accurate. I bought another considering its longevity.!
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: Works to stop leaking tanks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the sole purpose of using on 20lb exchanged propane tanks. A lot of them have bad seals and leak when using the standard QCC1 connector (like on a BBQ grill). That's because the seal is on the tank. This allows me to stop a leaking tank by using a POL connector instead (which has the seal on the connector), plus it tells me how much gas is left. Great buy and stops the frustration of having to take back a leaking tank.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Clark

customer_reviews.title: Nice gauge, easy to find.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t find an adapter locally, but Amazon had exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the grill!
customer_reviews.text: This product replaces an older model that began to leak after several years. I noticed one feature that this model employs that the predecessor did not is a rubber O-ring on the propane tank end.. This provides a much better seal. The unit is easy to install, well constructed, and I look forward to great performance moving forward. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome and I love that it glows. I have them installed on all my tanks.
customer_reviews.author: M. Buzek

customer_reviews.title: LP fuel gauge for generator
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact I can gauge how much propane I'm using a lot better now and I use it to gauge to run my generator and Gage how much LP fule I'm buring.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.

customer_reviews.title: Dozyant DZ PG
customer_reviews.text: I have a RV and I never know how low the tanks are this year I thought one tank was low so I took it in and was told it was near full. I went to amazon and found the Dozyant DZ PG and ordered it, It was very ez to put on the tank and it gave me a accurate reading. I am very pleased with it and the price was very good.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy rotman

customer_reviews.title: Nice gauge, simple and solid
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my grill . I hate running out of gas in the middle of a cook out.
customer_reviews.author: Don H

customer_reviews.title: Good for old rv with no gauges
customer_reviews.text: Great fit to my rv and it works well so far!
customer_reviews.author: The Davis Family

customer_reviews.title: Save time refilling your propane tank
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I dont have to move my RV in order to get propane! Took just a minute to install.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Kucera

customer_reviews.title: Turn the narrow black turn knob to the left to proper attachment to the tank.
customer_reviews.text: I got this product two days ago and am very happy with it. At first I was confused about the attachment because the side towards the tank looked like a different fitting than the one I was replacing. I learned that you have to turn the narrow plastic turn knob TO THE LEFT because this fitting has a left-handed thread. Once I figured this out the attachment was a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Z buyer

customer_reviews.title: Grillin'
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly. Fuel level gauge works well. Hopefully we won't ever run out of propane again while cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Dozant that I have purchased. I bought a new propane grill, so I needed a new valve. The first one still works great. Just wanted a new one. It's a quality valve, and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Holds up outside fairly well
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Holds up outside fairly well. I did notice some condensation under cap but is still functioning properly after over a month already.
customer_reviews.author: C-ROB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This gauge works just as it should. Attaches easily and seems to be quite accurate! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TooBratty

customer_reviews.title: Nice gauge.  Works perfectly for my generator tank setup.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased so I could always know my tank levels. Going by weight was getting old and so am I. This is much easier than trying to pick them up and shake them around. The needle and the gauge levels both glow in the dark so it can be viewed in low light situations. It seems to be accurate so far. It shows both tanks tested as full, just like it should. Will purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: TTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have room to install
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work as intended. I did have a slight issue closing the propane access door on my trailer with these installed (1 on each tank) due to the added length.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: This product was very handy
customer_reviews.text: I liked this item very good happy i got it
customer_reviews.author: Christal

customer_reviews.title: Propane tank gauge
customer_reviews.text: Will use this gauge on our propane tanks on our 5-wheel. Haven’t put it on yet, but think it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: Propane Gauge
customer_reviews.text: DozyantTank gauge working as expected, very solid construction, very pleased! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Fraski

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I just installed it yesterday and there seems to be on issues and now I can tell how much propane I have available for my RV.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Gifford

customer_reviews.title: I have a kenmore and it would show how much propane was in there just fine, but it did not seem to run the ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me at all, I even returned and bought another in hopes I got a dud, but same result. I have a kenmore and it would show how much propane was in there just fine, but it did not seem to run the propane through to start up the gas grill, which to me made this a pointless purchase. Most likely will just avoid getting a gauge all together.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money. Works as expected, and nice to have on bigger tanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good gage, I would prefer a gage with # reading however this keeps me informed. I recommend It.
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool it let me know my tank line was leaking.
customer_reviews.author: donald Eckels

customer_reviews.title: I bought this specifically for a gas BBQ grill. I have always used charcoal but as I am getting old the gas grill looks easier.
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice if the details on the gauge would have been a little more complete. It seems the 20lb propane tank and the gas grill I purchased have something called Type 1 connections. Now I need a fitting that is female threaded to a Type 1. So I checked Lowes. Should have done that first I guess. I could have had the proper fitting 3 days ago. Old dog still learning new tricks.
customer_reviews.author: tweeter53

customer_reviews.title: It works, no leaks.
customer_reviews.text: It works, no leaks, simple to install. I had two other adapters with gauges purchased from elsewhere fail. This product has not failed, and I am relieved.
customer_reviews.author: Kopernick

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, doesn't do a good job
customer_reviews.text: Got this hoping it would be accurate on our external 5 gal tank for our rv. Always said full (in the green), until it showed empty. Ran out of hot water in the shower when it was needed. Went outside to switch over to our big tank, looked at the gauge and it showed empty! I check it every day and it didn't show getting low at all! Just went from full (green) to red (empty) in 3 hours since I checked it last. We hadn't used anything else requiring the propane before taking a shower. Not accurate at all!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I did not give 5 stars is because it must be removed to refill the propane bottle and another adapter connected. It took me two trips to figure this out. Also be aware that ambient temperature will affect the level reading as mine shows about 1/3 in the green band when filled but it is 20-30 degrees out. There are fancier ones with ambient adjusted gauges but don’t actually change the functionality as all the gauges are qualitative and not quantitative.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: The valve attaches and works fine. The one disappointing feature is in order for the fuel gauge to work, the tank must be connected to an appliance AND the tank valve must be turned on. So there is no way to know how much fuel is in the tank when it is sitting in storage. I imagine a completely different design would allow you to see the level of a disconnected tank. That said, for the money it is still a good product. Sealed well easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for something that would let me run things that needed the "little" propane tanks--like my generator-- from the "big" propane tanks. I sure as heck wasn't able to find these at a local store anywhere, but I found a plethora of them here on Amazon! Exactly what I needed, trivial to use and install. WELL worth the money for anybody who is off-grid!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Woodcock

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 that both read same thing don't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 gages for my propane tanks 1 tank I just filled the other was almost empty both gages read the same thing very low almost empty so I had no idea about how much gas was in either tank there were no instructions I have a dual regulator on both tanks. Save your money Im going to try and return unless company contacts me to try and explain the reasoning why they read exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: The saint 07

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I can monitor the propane level in my new 100lb tank that I just got to power my 10k watt generator. Just had to put it to use today and it's working nicely. I bought a multi valve tank that holds 24 gallons of liquid propane. I had hoped to set up a regulator before using it but I screwed in the gauge and then screwed on the hose and fired up the generator. At least I can tell when I need to replace the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Ivana B

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: This product has an indicator in which it is supposed to mark as the volume of gas decreases, but as time passed, the indicator did not move from the "green" starting position, so you should be constantly monitoring it, the surprise is that a change from being in the green "with gas" to the red "replacement soon" band from one day to the next without going through the yellow one. This is why I consider that the manometer is not accurate at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo

customer_reviews.title: Works to convert quick connect to the other common grill tank connection.
customer_reviews.text: You will need one more item for it to work and that is the attachment used to refill your quick disconnect tanks. It would be helpful probably to sell them together.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: disappointed, it didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I traveled for the holidays, picked it up in the US back in December. After arriving home to Central America, I was disappointed to see that the item didn't work as it should have. It showed the level of gas in the tank but wouldn't past gas through to the regulator and on the the burner......no gas! NO Bueno. Now it's after the thirty day return deadline and I not in the US. Not a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the fitting is screwed in all the way or it doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I received this adapter to connect my 100lb propane tank to a long extension hose. I fought with the connection for an hour. It didn’t fit, but I was sure I bought the right parts! After staring at the adapter, scratching my head... I realized the person who put it together, dint screw the fitting in. Once I finished the job that someone else didn’t bother to do, it works. The part is as advertised fine and the quality of the construction is as expected. The quality control of this manufacturing sucked!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Didnt read properly, great return shipping option free of cost
customer_reviews.text: I filled a 20lb tank from my bbq and thought this would be great to have. However on a perfectly good completely full, the gauge read just barely into the grenn "full" indicator. Shipping was resonable and they let me return it withouy problem or question. Money was returned to me accoubt within a few days of sending it back
customer_reviews.author: AUSTIN

customer_reviews.title: If you have an older style tank
customer_reviews.text: Picked up an old, and full, 100 pound LP tank. Needed this. Haven't used it so cant attest to gauge accuracy. Sure it's close but will see.
customer_reviews.author: PipeFighter

customer_reviews.title: Would be perfect if it didn't have the worthless gauge
customer_reviews.text: Works great, gauge isn't waterproof and doesn't seem to be very helpful. Shows at bottom of green on full tank. Get the unit without the gauge.
customer_reviews.author: mrbighughjass

customer_reviews.title: Reverse/left hand thread to get into a 100lb tank from Lowes
customer_reviews.text: After three months this valve appears to be functioning well, reading tank level accurately, and not leaking which I guess is a plus. UPDATE 9.5.20: after several months the gauge is inaccurate. Moving to putting a scale underneath.
customer_reviews.author: SnackLover

customer_reviews.title: great producr
customer_reviews.text: love this product i can use it on both old and new tanks to read how much propane remains and it converts old style to new as well
customer_reviews.author: Casbeer

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed to be able to know how much propane I have left in my tank. Now I know when to call for refills.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Seals up fine, no leaks
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I was worried that it was a cheap imitation. But it is just fine. No leaking. Gauge is nice on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Mustang Gregg

customer_reviews.title: unsure of accuracy
customer_reviews.text: not sure how accurate. It reads full but we have used that tank. Kinda wish I had gotten the one that has warm and cold weather readings. I am assuming I will at lease know when it is getting really low
customer_reviews.author: Katie1554

customer_reviews.title: Not Universal
customer_reviews.text: This valve is most certainly not universal. It doesn't fit on my tank at all
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: did not last a year
customer_reviews.text: poor quality, did not last a year!! only had to fill tank twice in 1 year and both times the gauge showed to still have plenty of gas in cylinder
customer_reviews.author: aubrey perry/johnnie perry

customer_reviews.title: Am I about out?
customer_reviews.text: Great little meter. I have used it on small bbq tank, 30 lb camper tank and 100 lb larger tank. It worked with great accuracy on all three. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Trail

customer_reviews.title: Adaptor
customer_reviews.text: I bought because I needed the adapter, the gauge only shows full or empty, there is no in between.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. It's a gauge. It fits a propane tank. It measure the pressure in the tank and gives you a handy colorful gauge indicating how full the tank is. Green = Good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy A. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Gauge does not go to full, only registers about 3/3rd full
customer_reviews.text: I installed it on a tank that had just been filled so I knew it was full. The gauge does not go all the way to full, shows about 2 thirds
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worked to fit from my large tank to use as normal tank.
customer_reviews.author: James B Wren

customer_reviews.title: Easy read
customer_reviews.text: Makes tank monitoring easy,! No more running out unexpectedly on a cold night or mid way cooking a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Mark McDade

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Did not accurately display the level of propane like it claims. Showed my tank was on the low end of full when I had just had it filled. However, when the tank was empty it showed empty. Screen is large enough to see and display is easy to read the level, if only it was truly accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Seth R Worrell

customer_reviews.title: Converts old style to new style!
customer_reviews.text: quick and easy... done deal.. screwed right into the propane tank.. regulator now screwed onto new style fitting!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus the Just

customer_reviews.title: Why don't they sell these locally....
customer_reviews.text: This paid for itself since I threw it on a 100 pounder for grilling.
customer_reviews.author: ehehUpNorth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Hurricane preparation time. I am using to fuel a 12500 Dura Max duel fuel portable generator. Perfect combo
customer_reviews.author: W. P. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Keeps track of our propane in our camper.
customer_reviews.text: No more guess work on propane tanks on camper. No leakage.
customer_reviews.author: scf

customer_reviews.title: Gauge
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t show accurate reading. Wouldn’t flow propane. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Tarro

customer_reviews.title: not good for split systems or big tanks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my camper to hook up a 100 lbs tank to the 2 way valve and the gauge is useless.... it might work on a single tank setup or smaller tanks but not for my setup; however the adapter works great otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy if you want to know when your tank is actually empty
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use this with (2) 40 lb propane tanks that we were using on a jobsite with space heaters. Once the tanks were 3/4 empty the gauges would be pinned on empty. We then used them off and on for 2 more days. Not to accurate!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas TM

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This item is great now I can see how much propane is in the tank I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to anyone that has propane tanks.
customer_reviews.text: I like the undersea how much gas is my propane tank I use hundred gallon tanks and it's hard to see when they are getting empty especially when they are locked down.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to know how much propane is left before starting to barbecue!
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality valve
customer_reviews.text: Quality materials easy installation no leaks. Easy to use. Easy to read Gage.
customer_reviews.author: Spongesnob

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what we were looking for...and at a really great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Not trustworthy for accuracy. Several readings shown as a very low tank needing to be replaced and that wasn’t the case at all. I took it off and it’s an ornament in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: J Singletary

customer_reviews.title: Boiling Crawfish Now
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to get use out of my 90lb bottle. I can hear my crawfish cookers heating up the water. Love that it has a gauge.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Put on my camper propane tanks. Seem to work good. Fit good and guages easy to read
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid performer, seems very well-made.
customer_reviews.text: Solid, works perfectly. Should last for a long time, with good quality brass.
customer_reviews.author: Dawna Parks

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is a fine product. Easy to use and install. It works perfectly. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate at all. Even with a brand new full tank it never shows full. It starts with the gauge on the line between green and yellow. I have 3 of these and they're all junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Gage is not right. Shows half on a full tank. Works good other wise.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.text: I just installed it today. It seems to work fine.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This my second order from Dozyant very pleased with productsvery pleased with item
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: It is accurate as long as you don’t have it out in the direct sunlight as the sun will heat up the tank which makes the gas expand and reads full sometimes. I use it on a tank that feeds tankless water heater.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney W.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This fit both propane tanks I have, and small 20lb and even a larger 100lb tank. Gauge seems to be fairly accurate
customer_reviews.author: P. W.

customer_reviews.title: DIdn't Fit Propane Tank
customer_reviews.text: While it claimed to be "universal" it didn't fit on the propane tank for our grill. There is nothing special or unique about he tank.

customer_reviews.title: This will give you a peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of running out of propane in an most inopportune time. the gauge is perfect! works real good recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Lower the pressure
customer_reviews.text: It lower the pressure making the flame small. Had to remove it to be able to cook

customer_reviews.title: Good gauge for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This gauge works like it should. It does get some condensation under the lens but, doesn't affect how it works.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This product used on my blackstone griddle works great. Now I will know when my tank is empty.

customer_reviews.title: A must for any LP gas grill
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality fuel gauge to watch when a new LP tank in needed

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This works the way it is supposed to. It’s easy to use and read.

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. Has been on the same fill arrow since I replaced the tank. Tank ran out and still says it’s full. POS product.

customer_reviews.title: Knowledge
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect. Finally know how much is in my tank to keep my workshop warm.

customer_reviews.text: Just what I order and works perfect for the job.

customer_reviews.title: Gauge easily installed into the tank with counterclockwise turns.
customer_reviews.text: I received a defective item. I contacted the manufacturer and was sent another item quickly. The replacement item works perfectly. I am very happy with the gauge.

customer_reviews.title: DOZYANT Universal Fit POL Propane Tank Adapter
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Fits well with no leaks. But just make sure you order the yellow Teflon tape to be safe. This will make the product even better and assure you do not lose expense propane.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

product_meta.title: DOZYANT Universal Fit POL Propane Tank Adapter with Gauge Converts POL LP Tank Service Valve to QCC1 / Type 1, Old to New Connection Type, Propane Tank Gauge
product_meta.description:
No more worries about running out of propane right in the middle of grilling, cooking, smoking, camping or rving. & no more unnecessary trips for refills when there was still some left in the tank. With the DOZYANT propane tank pressure Gauge on board, you'll always know when you're good to go.

- easy to attached> 
screw threads let you attach it without tools, & it fits all brands & models with a QCC1/Type1 connection andup to a 40lb. Propane tank. This propane tank gas Gauge can be worked with propane tank cylinders, propane regulator with hose & propane adapter. Great for using gas grill, heaters, smoker, camp stoves, lanterns, tabletop grills, fire pit tables, Turkey fryers & more propane gas tank cylinder appliances. 

- solid brass withstands weather, scratching, denting & corroding

cheaper metals Can get corroded, plated surfaces scratched & worn away. But solid brass Is impervious to the elements & highly resistant to damage during use or transport. Provide you the heavy-duty service.

- color coded dial for easy viewing 

no need to bend over or squint at tiny level markings. One glance at the dozyant's large dial will tell you whether you're in the red (empty), yellow (low) or green (sufficient). 

- security> 
long lasting high quality material provides secure, air-tight connection between propane tank cylinder & propane regulator with hose, propane adapter & more propane appliances. Provides excess flow protection in case of a broken gas line & thermal protection in case of fire.
feature_bullets: [Upgraded version] propane gas Gauge meter, converts POL LP tank to Qcc1/Type1 hoses and regulators.
Heavy duty 100% solid brass construction withstands weather, scratching, denting and corroding. Easy to install.
Monitors fuel level without removing the tank. No tools required and easy to install with handheld grip for tightening.

This propane tank gas Gauge can convert your old style connection type propane tank to new type (Type1/ Qcc1), it can be worked with propane tank cylinders, propane regulator with hose and propane adapter

Coming with dust cover. No tools required and easy to install with handheld grip for tightening. Great for using gas grill, heater, smoker, camp stove, lantern, tabletop grill, Fire pit Table, Turkey fryer and more propane appliances.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars443 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
